content: [TextBlock(text="[2025 | Age 22] Tokyo's skyline in my rearview mirror, I'm now stepping off the Level 4 Autonomous Shuttle at JFK. The neon lights of Shibuya still dance in my eyes, but the concrete jungle of NYC feels like a new canvas waiting for my touch. Japan taught me the beauty of simplicity and the depth of tradition amidst technology. Excited to see how my newfound perspective blends with the hustle of the Big Apple. #NYCReturn #DigitalNomad", type='text')]
